Reference a figure or table

Source: R/NMFSReports.R
ref_figtab.Rd

Reference a figure or table

ref_figtab(list_obj, nickname, sublist = "number")

Arguments

list_obj

A list object created by figure_list or table_list.
nickname

A unique string that is used to identify the plot or table in figure_list or table_list, respectively.
sublist

A string of the sublist in figure_list or table_list you want the contents returned from.

Value

The item in the list.

Examples

figure_list <- c()
pp <- plot(x = 1, y = 1)

figure_list <- save_figures(
   figure = pp,
   figure_list = figure_list,
   header = "blah blah blah",
   nickname = "example_figure", # a unique name you can refer back to
   cnt_chapt_content = "003",
   cnt = "012")
figure_list <- save_figures(
   figure = pp,
   figure_list = figure_list,
   header = "blah blah blah",
   nickname = "example_figure_other", # a unique name you can refer back to
   cnt_chapt_content = "003",
   cnt = "013")
figure_list

#> $`Figure 012. blah blah blah.`
#> $`Figure 012. blah blah blah.`$plot
#> NULL
#> 
#> $`Figure 012. blah blah blah.`$caption
#> [1] "Figure 012. blah blah blah."
#> 
#> $`Figure 012. blah blah blah.`$header
#> [1] "Figure 012. blah blah blah."
#> 
#> $`Figure 012. blah blah blah.`$nickname
#> [1] "example_figure"
#> 
#> $`Figure 012. blah blah blah.`$number
#> [1] "012"
#> 
#> $`Figure 012. blah blah blah.`$footnote
#> [1] ""
#> 
#> 
#> $`Figure 013. blah blah blah.`
#> $`Figure 013. blah blah blah.`$plot
#> NULL
#> 
#> $`Figure 013. blah blah blah.`$caption
#> [1] "Figure 013. blah blah blah."
#> 
#> $`Figure 013. blah blah blah.`$header
#> [1] "Figure 013. blah blah blah."
#> 
#> $`Figure 013. blah blah blah.`$nickname
#> [1] "example_figure_other"
#> 
#> $`Figure 013. blah blah blah.`$number
#> [1] "013"
#> 
#> $`Figure 013. blah blah blah.`$footnote
#> [1] ""
#> 
#> 
refnum <- ref_figtab(
   list_obj = figure_list,
   nickname = "example_figure",
   sublist = "number")
refnum

#> [1] 12
print(paste0("Please refer to figure ", refnum,
             " to see this figure, not the other figure."))

#> [1] "Please refer to figure 12 to see this figure, not the other figure."
